writer.name: 诺尔·亚历杭德罗 Noel Alejandro

director.name: 诺尔·亚历杭德罗 Noel Alejandro

introduction: Clement wants people to wake up. Daniel wants to sleep alone under the stars. The world is a battlefield where logic and fear fight viciously for control. Weary of it, two men build their own hallucinogenic cosmos where they can play and exist - where only their bodies make the rules, and the mind is set free by pleasure. Brainchild of the Noel Alejandro project, Bedtime Stories is an ongoing series focused on the beauty of intimacy. Each new film combines one thought-provoking opening and the usual sophisticated filmography to create stories that are new, intimately inspiring, and visually appealing.
